headline: Comcast’s Universal Ads Appoints David Shaw as Head of Global Expansion to Oversee Platform's International Rollout
summary: NEW YORK, January 20, 2026--Comcast’s Universal Ads today announced the appointment of David Shaw as Head of Global Expansion. Universal Ads, which launched last year in the U.S., enables brands of any size to create, buy, and measure ads across premium video. In his new role, Shaw will lead the commercial rollout of the platform, globally.

headline: After a Lousy 2025, Can Theme Park Stocks Bounce Back in 2026?
summary: Gated attractions failed for investors last year. The new year should be better.
